tutorialGroupImportDialog.finishedWarning: Artemis has finished importing the tutorial group. Be aware that the tutorial groups were created without schedule and default settings such as assigning yourself as tutor. You can change these settings and add a schedule by editing the respective groups.

explanations.description: This dialog allows you to import tutorial groups and student registrations from a CSV file. If a tutorial group does not exist, it will be created. If students are listed in the csv then they will be moved from their current tutorial group to the new one specified in the CSV file.
explanations.requirements: Each row must include a value for the tutorial group title. To register students, each row must include a value for either the matriculation number or the login. First and last names are optional. The top row of the CSV file must specify the headers.

supportedHeaderNames.label: Supported header names (versions with spaces, underscores, hyphens and uppercase letters are also supported):
supportedHeaderNames.requiredIfStudentRegistration: One of those is required if you want to register students (to identify students) :
supportedHeaderNames.tutorialGroupTitle: For tutorial group title: Tutorial Group Title
supportedHeaderNames.lastName: For last Name: last name or family name

errorMessages.withoutTitle: The following rows miss a tutorial group title:
errorMessages.invalidTitle: The following rows have an invalid tutorial group title (Titles may only contain letters, numbers, spaces and hyphens and max 19 characters):
errorMessages.noIdentificationInformation: The following rows specify a user but do not contain a login or matriculation number:
errorMessages.duplicatedLogins: The following logins are assigned to multiple tutorial groups:
errorMessages.duplicatedRegistrationNumbers: The following matriculation numbers are assigned to multiple tutorial groups:

serverErrors.nouserfound: No matching student found in course
serverErrors.multipleregistrations: Multiple registrations in csv for student

csvFile.label: Select a .csv file
csvFile.validationFailed: Please repair the file, it is not considered valid due to the following error:

checkbox.label: Do you want to specify a header and column to filter the rows?
checkbox.explanation: Only those rows that have the specified value in the specified column, will be parsed from the CSV file.

statusHeaderInput.label: Status Header
statusHeaderInput.placeholder: Enter the header that contains the status of the registration. E.g. 'Place'
statusHeaderInput.maxLengthValidationError: Status Header is limited to {{ max }} characters!

fixedPlaceValueInput.label: Confirmed Value
fixedPlaceValueInput.placeholder: Enter the value that indicates a confirmed fixed place. E.g. 'Confirmed Place'
fixedPlaceValueInput.maxLengthValidationError: Confirmed Value is limited to {{ max }} characters!
